headline: How The Intuitive Surgical (ISRG) Story Is Shifting With Dv5, FDA Clears, And Valuation Jitters
summary: Intuitive Surgical’s fair value estimate has been updated to US$611.82 per share from US$596.36, a move of about 2.6% that reflects a refined view of the company’s long term setup. Behind this shift, recent analyst research points to a split narrative, with some highlighting the Dv5 rollout, procedure trends, and sector conditions into 2026, while others focus on valuation, sector rotation risk, and policy headlines. In the sections that follow, you will see how these moving pieces fit...
